mapper.insert: INSERT INTO as_site_env( logid, sdevice_id, site_id, site_name, corp_id, corp_name, device_id, device_code, device_name, device_model, env_code, env_name, env_svalue, env_evalue, env_wsvalue, env_wevalue, unit_id, unit_name, run_value, cur_state, state_time, create_time ) VALUES ( #{logid}, #{sdeviceId}, #{siteId}, #{siteName}, #{corpId}, #{corpName}, #{deviceId}, #{deviceCode}, #{deviceName}, #{deviceModel}, #{envCode}, #{envName}, #{envSvalue}, #{envEvalue}, #{envWsvalue}, #{envWevalue}, #{unitId}, #{unitName}, #{runValue}, #{curState}, #{stateTime}, #{createTime} )
